revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Geniatech |model=Enjoy TV |revision=Stick (ATV100) |asin=B00B0TSCLY;GB; |fcc_date=07/31/2012 |manuf_country= |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability= |type=computer-on-a-stick, media player |fcc_id=ZJU-000120010 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Amlogic |cpu1_model=AML8726-M3 |cpu1_cspeed=800 |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, microSD Card |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=RF-LINK RL-UM02 |wi1_module_if=USB (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188CUS |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |addl_chips= |flags=HDMI out |stock_boot= |stock_os=Android;;4.04; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= }} {{TagLine|Geniatech Enjoy TV Stick}} :[http://www.geniatech.com/pa/atv100.asp Product page] As this device is listed in FCC test report of [[Geniatech Enjoy TV Nano (ATV310B)|ATV310B]] (FCC ID: ZJU-000120010), :this device uses an [[RF-LINK RL-UM02]] Wi-Fi module (''[[Realtek]]'' RTL8188CUS). There are probably [http://www.geniatech.com/news/geniatech-upgrades-hdmi-stick-atv100.asp multiple revisions of this device]. *CPU: ARM Cortex A9 @800MHz (single core, 3D engine) ===Links=== *[http://androidyo.com/2012/09/15/unboxing-atv100-amlogic-8726-m3-tv-stick/ Unboxing ATV100 AMLogic 8726-M3 TV Stick]
*[http://www.cnx-software.com/2012/06/09/geniatech-enjoy-tv-stick-atv100-amlogic-aml8726-m3-android-4-0-hdmi-dongle/ Information + a video showing the device] :The extendable metal antenna on the device is apparently for Wi-Fi. :The last one is M1. ''What's the difference between M1 and M3?'' :A lower power consumption and we can support DDR3 (1GB DDR3 RAM) :There is a [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/USB_On-The-Go USB OTG] (Female Micro-B used for power) port on-board.
